1.1.0.name: connect20/MarKor_QuickInfo
1.1.0.description: This module allow you display short info about shop's contact on footer or on right column. On the right column you can set image displaying with module.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
